title: Even the Nights Are Better
lyrics:
I, I was the lonely one
Wondering what went wrong
Why love had gone
And left me lonely
I, I was so confused

Feeling like I'd just been used

Then you came to me

And my loneliness left me



I use to think I was tied to a heartache

That was the heartbreak

But now that I've found you



Even the nights are better

Now that we're here together

Even the nights are better

Since I found you

Even the days are brighter

When someone you loves beside you

Even the nights are better

Since I found you



You, you knew just what to do

Cause you had been lonely too

And you showed me how

To ease the pain



And you did more

Than mend a broken heart

Cause now you've made a fire start

And I, I can see that you feel

The same way

I never dream that someone will hold me

Until you told me

But now that I've found you

Even the nights are better

Now that we're here together

Even the nights are better

Since I found you

Even the days are brighter

When someone you loves beside you

Even the nights are better

Since I found you



I never dream that someone will hold me

Until you told me

But now that I've found you



Even the nights are better

Now that we're here together

Even the nights are better

Since I found you

Even the days are brighter

When someone you loves beside you

Even the nights are better

Since I found you
